Translations.Text: Abagize iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu kuba ariryo koraniro ry’ububeshi
Nivyo, ndarahiye kw’izina ry’Imana yuko uko tuzoba baza abantu bose k’umusi w’imperuka
Rero bimenyeshe ivyo wategetswe kugira, kandi ube kure n’ibikorwa vyabagereranya Imana n’ibindi bintu
Mu	vy’ukuri	twebwe	turaguhagije	mukugu	kingira	n’ivyo	bafata minenerwe
Abagira	Imana	hamwe	n’izindi	Mana	z’ibintazi,	rero	ubu	vuba bazotahura neza
Mu vy’ukuri twebwe turazi neza yuko igikiriza cawe cugarijwe n’ivyo bivugira
Nutakambire Umuremyi wawe hamwe n’ukuyihayaza, kandi ube muba yipfukamira bashize imitwe yabo hasi
Kandi usenge Umuremyi wawe kugeza aho uzoshikirwa n’urupfu. Igisomwa c’Inzuki.	Ikigabane ca (14). Camanukiye IMakkat. Gifise imirongo
Itegeko ry’Imana rizoshika, rero ntimuyihimirize kuko niyo yisukuye n’ivyoba bigabanutse vyose hamwe nukuyininahaza kwose nukubayi gereranya Imana n’ibindi bintu vyabo bahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri
Ibamanurira Abamarayika hamwe n’ubutumwa kw’itegeko ryayo kubo yishakiye mubashumvyi biwe yuko batuza abantu, atawundi akwiye gusengwa atari jewe jenyene gusa, rero nimuntinye
Niwe yaremye Amajuru n’Isi bimwe vy’ukuri, ari n’iteka ntangere ry’ukuta gereranya Imana n’ibindi bintu vyabo bahakanyi b’Imana
Niyo yaremye ikiremwa muntu kw’Ima ry’intanga, mukanya ng’uyo wa muntu yabaye umuntu w’amananiza aboneka neza k’umugaragaro
Niyo yaremye ibikoko, murivyo muharonkeramwo ubushuhe n’ubundi bumaro n’ibindi navyo mukavyikenurako
Mukanezerwa mugihe muzicuye k’umugoroba nomugihe mubiturukije kuja kurisha mugitondo
